sentences.en: an index to aid the reader
sentences.cn: 方便读者的索引

sentences.en: But the whole question of aid is a tricky political one.
sentences.cn: 但是整个援助问题是个非常复杂的政治问题。

sentences.en: Calcium may aid in the prevention of colon cancer.
sentences.cn: 钙可能有助于预防结肠癌。

sentences.cn: 运载人道主义援助的车队

sentences.en: first aid
sentences.cn: 急救；急救护理

sentences.en: Foreign aid from many countries poured into the famine area.
sentences.cn: 来自许多国家的救援物资纷纷送到饥荒地区。

sentences.en: Foreign aid workers will not be allowed into the stricken areas.
sentences.cn: 国外救援人员不准进入灾区。

sentences.en: He has been granted legal aid (=  free legal services  ) .
sentences.cn: 他获得了法律援助。

sentences.en: He keeps coming to the aid of this damsel in distress.
sentences.cn: 他不断出手相助这位落难女子。

sentences.en: He succeeded with the aid of a completely new method he discovered.
sentences.cn: 借助于自己发现的一种全新的方法，他获得了成功。

sentences.en: He was breathing only with the aid of a ventilator.
sentences.cn: 他只有靠呼吸器呼吸。

sentences.en: His officials have visited Washington to press their case for economic aid.
sentences.cn: 他的官员们已经访问了华盛顿，竭力要求得到经济援助。

sentences.en: I thought a phonetic spelling might aid in pronunciation.
sentences.cn: 我想语音拼写可能有助于发音。

sentences.en: Just crank up your hearing aid a peg or two.
sentences.cn: 把助听器调高一两个刻度就可以。

sentences.en: Legal Aid can often provide referral to other types of agencies.
sentences.cn: 法律援助机构通常可以帮助引荐到其他类型的机构去。

sentences.en: The $40 million-a-month aid payments will remain on ice.
sentences.cn: 每月4,000万美元的援助款项将继续搁置下去。

sentences.en: The aid will not be disbursed until next year.
sentences.cn: 援助款到明年才会下拨。

sentences.en: The book is an invaluable aid to teachers of literature.
sentences.cn: 这本书对于教授文学的老师来说帮助非常大。

sentences.en: The case for aid to eastern Europe is taken as read.
sentences.cn: 援助东欧的主张被认为完全正确。

sentences.en: The civil war is obstructing distribution of famine relief by aid agencies.
sentences.cn: 内战阻碍着救援机构对饥荒赈济物资的配给。

sentences.en: They siphon foreign aid money into their personal bank accounts.
sentences.cn: 他们把国外救济金非法转入了个人银行账户。
